name: CurveDriver 2
description:
CurveDriver 2 is a car driving game where the goal is to dodge other cars and in the meantime keep your fuel level up high! Each 15 second, score is recieved, 10 points if your speed is less than 50MPH, 20 points if your speed is faster than 50MPH.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Car control

Check the previous game here

If you want to want to get the source code, you can buy it down below!
